var.name: abstract
var.description: abstract of the item (e.g. the abstract of a journal article)

var.name: annote
var.description: reader’s notes about the item content

var.name: archive
var.description: archive storing the item

var.name: archive_location
var.description: storage location within an archive (e.g. a box and folder number)

var.name: archive-place
var.description: geographic location of the archive

var.name: authority
var.description: issuing or judicial authority (e.g. “USPTO” for a patent, “Fairfax Circuit Court” for a legal case)

var.name: call-number
var.description: call number (to locate the item in a library)

var.name: citation-label
var.description: label identifying the item in in-text citations of label styles (e.g. “Ferr78”). May be assigned by the CSL processor based on item metadata.

var.name: citation-number
var.description: index (starting at 1) of the cited reference in the bibliography (generated by the CSL processor)

var.name: collection-title
var.description: title of the collection holding the item (e.g. the series title for a book)

var.name: container-title
var.description: title of the container holding the item (e.g. the book title for a book chapter, the journal title for a journal article)

var.name: container-title-short
var.description: short/abbreviated form of “container-title” (also accessible through the “short” form of the “container-title” variable)

var.name: dimensions
var.description: physical (e.g. size) or temporal (e.g. running time) dimensions of the item

var.name: DOI
var.description: Digital Object Identifier (e.g. “10.1128/AEM.02591-07”)

var.name: event
var.description: name of the related event (e.g. the conference name when citing a conference paper)

var.name: event-place
var.description: geographic location of the related event (e.g. “Amsterdam, the Netherlands”)

var.name: first-reference-note-number
var.description: number of a preceding note containing the first reference to the item. Assigned by the CSL processor. The variable holds no value for non-note-based styles, or when the item hasn’t been cited in any preceding notes.

var.name: genre
var.description: class, type or genre of the item (e.g. “adventure” for an adventure movie, “PhD dissertation” for a PhD thesis)

var.name: ISBN
var.description: International Standard Book Number

var.name: ISSN
var.description: International Standard Serial Number

var.name: jurisdiction
var.description: geographic scope of relevance (e.g. “US” for a US patent)

var.name: keyword
var.description: keyword(s) or tag(s) attached to the item

var.name: locator
var.description: a cite-specific pinpointer within the item (e.g. a page number within a book, or a volume in a multi-volume work). Must be accompanied in the input data by a label indicating the locator type (see the Locators term list), which determines which term is rendered by cs:label when the “locator” variable is selected.

var.name: medium
var.description: medium description (e.g. “CD”, “DVD”, etc.)

var.name: note
var.description: (short) inline note giving additional item details (e.g. a concise summary or commentary)

var.name: original-publisher
var.description: original publisher, for items that have been republished by a different publisher

var.name: original-publisher-place
var.description: geographic location of the original publisher (e.g. “London, UK”)

var.name: original-title
var.description: title of the original version (e.g. “Война и мир”, the untranslated Russian title of “War and Peace”)

var.name: page
var.description: range of pages the item (e.g. a journal article) covers in a container (e.g. a journal issue)

var.name: page-first
var.description: first page of the range of pages the item (e.g. a journal article) covers in a container (e.g. a journal issue)

var.name: PMCID
var.description: PubMed Central reference number

var.name: PMID
var.description: PubMed reference number

var.name: publisher-place
var.description: geographic location of the publisher

var.name: references
var.description: resources related to the procedural history of a legal case

var.name: reviewed-title
var.description: title of the item reviewed by the current item

var.name: scale
var.description: scale of e.g. a map

var.name: section
var.description: container section holding the item (e.g. “politics” for a newspaper article)

var.name: source
var.description: from whence the item originates (e.g. a library catalog or database)

var.name: status
var.description: (publication) status of the item (e.g. “forthcoming”)

var.name: title
var.description: primary title of the item

var.name: title-short
var.description: short/abbreviated form of “title” (also accessible through the “short” form of the “title” variable)

var.name: URL
var.description: Uniform Resource Locator (e.g. “http://aem.asm.org/cgi/content/full/74/9/2766”)

var.name: version
var.description: version of the item (e.g. “2.0.9” for a software program)

var.name: year-suffix
var.description: disambiguating year suffix in author-date styles (e.g. “a” in “Doe, 1999a”)

var.name: chapter-number
var.description: chapter number

var.name: collection-number
var.description: number identifying the collection holding the item (e.g. the series number for a book)

var.name: edition
var.description: (container) edition holding the item (e.g. “3” when citing a chapter in the third edition of a book)

var.name: issue
var.description: (container) issue holding the item (e.g. “5” when citing a journal article from journal volume 2, issue 5)

var.name: number
var.description: number identifying the item (e.g. a report number)

var.name: number-of-pages
var.description: total number of pages of the cited item

var.name: number-of-volumes
var.description: total number of volumes, usable for citing multi-volume books and such

var.name: volume
var.description: (container) volume holding the item (e.g. “2” when citing a chapter from book volume 2)

var.name: accessed
var.description: date the item has been accessed

var.name: event-date
var.description: date the related event took place

var.name: issued
var.description: date the item was issued/published

var.name: original-date
var.description: (issue) date of the original version

var.name: submitted
var.description: date the item (e.g. a manuscript) has been submitted for publication

var.name: collection-editor
var.description: editor of the collection holding the item (e.g. the series editor for a book)

var.name: composer
var.description: composer (e.g. of a musical score)

var.name: container-author
var.description: author of the container holding the item (e.g. the book author for a book chapter)

var.name: director
var.description: director (e.g. of a film)

var.name: editorial-director
var.description: managing editor (“Directeur de la Publication” in French)

var.name: illustrator
var.description: illustrator (e.g. of a children’s book)

var.name: interviewer
var.description: interviewer (e.g. of an interview)

var.name: recipient
var.description: recipient (e.g. of a letter)

var.name: reviewed-author
var.description: author of the item reviewed by the current item

var.name: language
var.description: Language code. Not intended for display purposes.
